description:
As an Operations Project Specialist, you will work on a variety of exciting projects in a fast growing organization with a lot of opportunities to take on complex problems that will require you to come up with creative solutions and models. You do not fear meeting various challenges head on. You will be working on supporting the Bay Area Operations Security team to gather data that will unlock actionable insights and help stakeholders formulate and answer the right business questions. This is a unique position that looks to identify a candidate with a strong skill set in problem solving, process documentation and presentation.

From keeping Googlers safe and secure to managing disruptive events, the ability to anticipate, deter, detect, and act are the pillars of Google’s Global Security and Resilience Services (GSRS) team. As a member of GSRS you will help develop a culture where safety, security and resiliency are integrated into every facet of Google, including the creative process. You will help us continually identify, evaluate and monitor enterprise risks that could affect business activities and provide business leaders the information they need to make critical decisions. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to create innovative strategies and develop programs that drive sustainable effectiveness.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 3 years of experience in operations.
  • Experience in gSuite products.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 3 years of experience working in an environment that requires strong oral and written communication skills, including the ability to communicate complex findings in a structured and clear manner to a non-technical audience through demonstrated presentations and shared project management tools.
  • 3 years of SQL knowledge with experience working with multiple large datasets and other programming language(s).
  • 3 years of experience with relevant software applications (i.e. Tableau, Aplos, etc.)
  • Project management experience within a large firm or within the tech industry.
  • Strong attention to detail with the ability to multitask in a fast paced environment that can oftentimes be filled with ambiguity.
responsibilities:
• Ability to lead various projects and initiatives for Bay Area Operations in support of Global Security and Resilience Service (GSRS).
  • Gather and analyze operational problems providing details and summaries structured clearly to a non-technical audience.
  • Partner with other teams inside and outside of GSRS to share knowledge and leverage assets efficiently and effectively.
  • Explore various project tools and applications to increase team productivity.
  • Be flexible with the ever changing work environment.
title: Operations Project Specialist, Global Security and Resilience Service
